author: Tay Yong Kwang J:
casename: Altvater Jakob Pte Ltd v Toh Eng Peng and Others
counsel: Adeline Maler James (Bernard Rada and Lee Law Corporation) for plaintiff; Jason Dendroff (Dhillon Dendroff and Partners) for seventh and eighth defendants
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Discovery of documents/Failure of seventh and eighth defendants to comply with "unless order" relating to discovery of documents/Judgment entered for plaintiff/Whether failure to comply with "unless order" was contumelious or contumacious
